unnormalised: Think of film festivals as a massive buffet for your eyes and ears. You get to sample films from all corners of the globe, stuff you wouldn't normally find playing at your local PVR. We're talking hidden gems from Kerala, quirky documentaries from Europe, and maybe even a sneak peek at the next big thing before it hits Netflix.
